name: SubsPlease DarkGreen
description:
A green-accented dark mode for the SubsPlease website. Some variables such as colors and border radius are tweakable at the top of the stylesheet.

For best results flip their dark mode switch to change the discord embed dark.
additional_info:
2020 Nov 16
----
- Styled the load more button
- Styled the new and hot releases icon to match the theme
----
2020 Oct 19
----
- Disabled pointer events on the preview image overlay to prevent it from flickering if you moved the mouse too fast toward it
----
2020 Oct 18

- Styled the preview image overlay for shows
- Trialing icons beside a few headers on the front page
